|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [cleanup](./notifications-node.cleanup.md) |  |
|  [deleteUserNotifications](./notifications-node.deleteusernotifications.md) | Function that deletes user notifications If notificationIds is not passed, all the notifications of the user are deleted |
|  [getUserNotifications](./notifications-node.getusernotifications.md) | Function that returns a users saved notifications |
|  [init](./notifications-node.init.md) | Initializing Notifications essential variables and connection variables |

|  [sendOnesignalNotification](./notifications-node.sendonesignalnotification.md) | Function that sends onesignal notifications |
|  [sendWhatsappNotification](./notifications-node.sendwhatsappnotification.md) | Function that sends notification using whatsapp |
|  [subscribeToFirebaseTopic](./notifications-node.subscribetofirebasetopic.md) | Function to subscribe to firebase topic |
|  [toggleNotificationReadStatus](./notifications-node.togglenotificationreadstatus.md) | Function that toggles notifications read status If notificationIds is not passed, all the notifications of the user gets their status toggled |
|  [unregisterDevice](./notifications-node.unregisterdevice.md) | Function that unregisters user device send deviceId to unregister one specific user device, else unregister all user devices |
|  [unsubscribeFromFirebaseTopics](./notifications-node.unsubscribefromfirebasetopics.md) | Function to unsubscribe from firebase topic |
